mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY to_number(bo_no) DESC) rnum , bo_no , emp_no , bo_title , bo_content , bo_cnt , TO_CHAR(bo_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bo_date , file_group_no FROM board WHERE 1=1 AND (bo_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR bo_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) T WHERE T.rnum BETWEEN (#{page} * #{itemsPerPage}) - (#{itemsPerPage} - 1) AND (#{page} * #{itemsPerPage})
